title: Issue a Permit to Work for Hot Work
description: A maintenance team needs to perform welding (hot work) on a crane. A safety officer must issue a permit to work.

tasks.description: Receive the request for a hot work permit, including the location and scope of work.
tasks.expected_outcome: Officer receives the request to perform welding on QC-03.

tasks.description: Verify that a risk assessment has been completed and all required safety precautions are in place (e.g., fire extinguisher, fire watch).
tasks.expected_outcome: Officer confirms all safety prerequisites are met.

tasks.description: Issue a time-limited hot work permit and log it in the safety system.
tasks.expected_outcome: A permit is issued for a specific time frame, and the maintenance team is authorized to begin work.
